content: free pattern 1 lion brand kit 2 yarn + free pdf download make the perfect crochet top pattern using lion brand mandala string to create a perfect wearable for the summer months this pattern is suitable for a beginner crocheter with knowledge of basic crochet stitches that is looking for a bit of a challenge intermediate crocheters will find this to be an easy pattern once a few row repeats are completed and the pattern becomes very intuitive written in american standard terms materials 3 25 mm crochet hook 3 4 5 6 skeins of lion brand mandala® string yarn country 557-212an #1 superfine weight yarn 1050 1400 1750 2100 yards skill level intermediate sizing xs/s m/l xl/2xl 3/4xl to fit bust 30/34 38/42 46/50 54/58 finished bust 40 48 56 64 length shoulder to waist 20 75 22 22 23 25 designed to fit with 6-10 positive ease 1 https //lifeandyarn com/free-easy-summer-crochet-top-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/4kf5n
